siat.dsl.data.acquisition.streaming.operations.client

Class ZookeeperMonitorBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • siat.dsl.data.acquisition.streaming.operations.client.ZookeeperMonitorBuilder

  • public class ZookeeperMonitorBuilder
extends java.lang.Object

    SIAT Project

    Layer: Data Storage Layer: Streaming Acquisition

    Package Name: siat.dsl.data.acquisition.streaming.operations.client

    Class Name: ZookeeperMonitorBuilder

    Since:
    2018-27-11 * The client can be use additional methods to set optional properties at the same time the instance is being created. 
     
 final String zk =  "zookeeper-1:2181,zookeeper-2:2181,zookeeper-3:2181";
 ZookeeperMonitor zkMonitor = new ZookeeperMonitorBuilder(zk)         // mandatory arg
                                  .withZKPollingDelayTime(1000)       // optional argument
                                  .withZKPollingInitialDelayTime(100) // optional argument
                                  .build();                           // create the instance
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Aftab Alam

    • Method Detail

      • withZKPollingDelayTime

        public ZookeeperMonitorBuilder withZKPollingDelayTime(int zkPollingDelayTime)
        Set the Zookeeper node polling time expressed in ms
        Parameters:
        zkPollingDelayTime - It is the delay time in ms between the termination of one Kafka broker polling and the commencement of the next.
        Returns:
        ZookeeperMonitorBuilder current instance

      • withZKPollingInitialDelayTime

        public ZookeeperMonitorBuilder withZKPollingInitialDelayTime(int zkPollingInitialDelayTime)
        Set the initial delay time before starting Zookeeper node polling
        Parameters:
        zkPollingInitialDelayTime - It is the time in ms to delay first Kafka broker polling
        Returns:
        ZookeeperMonitorBuilder current instance

      • withZKSessionTimeout

        public ZookeeperMonitorBuilder withZKSessionTimeout(int zookeeperSessionTimeout)
        Set Zookeeper session timeout.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        ZookeeperMonitorBuilder current instance

      • withZKMonitorListener

        public ZookeeperMonitorBuilder withZKMonitorListener(ZKMonitorCallback zkMonitorCallback)
        Set Kafka monitor listener
        Parameters:
        zkMonitorCallback - It is an implementation of ZKMonitorCallback to notify the client when an Zookeeper event happen
        Returns:
        ZookeeperMonitorBuilder current instance

      • build

        public ZookeeperMonitor build()
        Create the instance
        Returns:
        a new Zookeeper monitor instance
        Throws:
